Quality Payment Program

Source: R/qpp.R
quality_payment.Rd

Quality Payment Program

Usage

quality_metrics(year)

quality_eligibility(year, npi)

Arguments

year

A vector of years from 2018 to 2025

npi

A vector of NPIs

Examples

quality_metrics(year = 2018:2025)
#> # A tibble: 32 × 4
#>     year category   metric                  mean
#>    <int> <fct>      <fct>                  <dbl>
#>  1  2018 Group      Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.230
#>  2  2019 Group      Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.216
#>  3  2020 Group      Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.210
#>  4  2021 Group      Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.499
#>  5  2022 Group      Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.499
#>  6  2023 Group      Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.499
#>  7  2024 Group      Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.499
#>  8  2025 Group      Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.499
#>  9  2018 Individual Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.288
#> 10  2019 Individual Dual Eligibility Ratio 0.269
#> # ℹ 22 more rows

quality_eligibility(
   year = 2018:2024,
   npi = c(1144544834, 1043477615, 1932365699, 1225701881))
#> # A tibble: 28 × 16
#>     year npi        entity last_name first_name middle_name is_new date_enrolled
#>    <int> <chr>      <fct>  <chr>     <chr>      <chr>       <lgl>  <date>       
#>  1  2024 1043477615 I      HUSSAIN   SARAH      K           FALSE  2014-01-27   
#>  2  2023 1043477615 I      HUSSAIN   SARAH      K           FALSE  2014-01-27   
#>  3  2022 1043477615 I      HUSSAIN   SARAH      K           FALSE  2014-01-27   
#>  4  2021 1043477615 I      HUSSAIN   SARAH      K           FALSE  2014-01-27   
#>  5  2020 1043477615 I      HUSSAIN   SARAH      K           FALSE  2014-01-27   
#>  6  2019 1043477615 I      HUSSAIN   SARAH      K           FALSE  2014-01-27   
#>  7  2018 1043477615 I      HUSSAIN   SARAH      K           FALSE  2014-01-27   
#>  8  2024 1144544834 I      MANLEY    EMILY      T           FALSE  2011-09-13   
#>  9  2023 1144544834 I      MANLEY    EMILY      T           FALSE  2011-09-13   
#> 10  2022 1144544834 I      MANLEY    EMILY      T           FALSE  2011-09-13   
#> # ℹ 18 more rows
#> # ℹ 8 more variables: is_maqi <lgl>, yearsInMedicare <int>,

build(
   endpoint("qppe"),
   query(npi = any_of(1144544834, 1043477615, 1932365699, 1225701881)))
